alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Hardeman, southwestern McNairy and southwestern Chester Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pocahontas, or near Big Hill Pond State Park, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Hill Pond State Park, Pocahontas, Masseyville, Robertson, Bethel Springs, Middleton, Hornsby, Rose Creek, Pine Top, Lisbon, Woodville, Lacy, Essary Springs and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
